title: Node.js and Express.js Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Node.js and Express.js for building backend APIs.

title: Database Design and MongoDB
description: Master database design and MongoDB for storing data.

title: RESTful API Development
description: Learn how to build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js.

title: Authentication and Authorization
description: Implement authentication and authorization in backend apps.

title: GraphQL for Backend Development
description: Learn GraphQL for building efficient backend APIs.

title: Python for Backend Development
description: Use Python and Flask/Django for backend development.

title: Microservices Architecture
description: Learn how to build microservices with Node.js and Docker.

title: SQL Databases with PostgreSQL
description: Master SQL databases with PostgreSQL for backend apps.

title: Backend Testing with Jest and Supertest
description: Learn how to write tests for backend apps.

title: Deployment and DevOps for Backend
description: Deploy backend apps with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD.
